metadata.title: RZ/G3S: Tell me about the mechanism to recover from the state of the VBATT mode

sections.content:
Question:
Please tell me about the mechanism to recover from the state of the VBATT mode.
Answer:
Operating the CPU and outputting a signal to external circuits are not possible in the VBATT mode. Therefore, it is necessary to make a mechanism to start powering on of the RZ/G3S from a PMIC or external circuit. 
The RZ/G3S needs to identify the state before recovery in the startup program after power-on to change the startup process.
